Description: Send a specific node in the JSON to a data tool rather than the entire OmniScript’s JSON.
Relabel the JSON node that is sent to a data tool.
Trim the JSON data that is sent from a data tool to a specific node rather than return the entire JSON to the OmniScript.
Relabel the JSON node that is returned from a data tool.
Call a DataRaptor Transform for more complex data mapping when sending data to a data tool.
Call a DataRaptor Transform for more complex data mapping when receiving data back from a data tool.
